languages.text: [Приставить оружие к своему подбородку] "Если не хочешь лишиться ценного образца, то живо отпускай моего спутника".

traits.locale_text: [Приставить оружие к своему подбородку] "Если не хочешь лишиться ценного образца, то живо отпускай моего спутника. Считаю до трех. Раз... два..."

languages.text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."
languages.original_text: [Приставить оружие к своему подбородку] "Если не хочешь лишиться ценного образца, то живо отпускай моего спутника".

traits.locale_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."
[Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."
[Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately. You have until the count of three. One... Two..."
[Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately. You have until the count of three. One... Two..."
[Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."
[Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

languages.text: [Porter le canon de votre arme sous votre menton] « Si vous ne voulez pas perdre un précieux spécimen, je vous conseille de libérer cet individu. »
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: [Porter le canon de votre arme sous votre menton] « Si vous ne voulez pas perdre un précieux spécimen, je vous conseille de libérer cet individu. Je compte jusqu'à trois. Un... Deux... »

languages.text: [将武器抵在自己的脖子上]“如果你不打算失去有价值的实验对象的话，就立刻放了我的同伴。”
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: [将武器抵在自己的脖子上]“如果你不打算失去有价值的实验对象的话，就立刻放了我的同伴。我只数到三！一……二……”

languages.text: [Deine Waffe an dein eigenes Kinn halten] "Wenn Ihr Euer wertvolles Versuchsstück nicht verlieren wollt, lasst Ihr meinen Gefährtin augenblicklich frei."
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: [Dir deine Waffe ans eigene Kinn halten] "Wenn Ihr Euer wertvolles Versuchsstück nicht verlieren wollt, lasst Ihr meinen Gefährtin augenblicklich frei. Ich zähle bis drei. Eins ... Zwei ..."

languages.text: [Apuntar tu arma hacia tu garganta] «A no ser que quieras perder un espécimen valioso, suelta a mi acompañante de inmediato».
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: [Apuntar tu arma hacia tu garganta] «A no ser que quieras perder un espécimen valioso, suelta a mi acompañante de inmediato. Contaré hasta tres. Uno... Dos...».

languages.text: ［自分の顎の付け根に武器を押し当てる］「貴重な標本を失いたくなければ、私の仲間をすぐに解放するんだ」
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: ［自分の顎の付け根に武器を押し当てる］「貴重な標本を失いたくなければ、私の仲間をすぐに解放するんだ」

languages.text: [Silahını kendi çenenin altına daya] "Değerli bir numuneyi kaybetmek istemiyorsan yoldaşlarımı derhâl serbest bırakırsın."
languages.original_text: [Press your weapon to the base of your own jaw] "Unless you want to lose a valuable specimen, you will release my companion immediately."

traits.locale_text: [Silahını kendi çenenin altına daya] "Değerli bir numuneyi kaybetmek istemiyorsan, yoldaşlarımı derhâl serbest bırakırsın."
